text: The Holocaust is a heavy metal band from Scotland created in 1977 and is based in the city of Edinburgh. The band consists of the singer Gary Lettice, guitar player Ed Dudley, drum player Nick Brockie, and bassist Robin Begg. ==References== Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1984 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1983 Category:Musical groups established in 1977 Category:Scottish rock bands Category:Holocaust deniers Category:Heavy metal bands
title: Holocaust (band)
